bibl.title: Excavating Q: The History and Setting of the Sayings Gospel.
bibl.note: Part I. Text and History. - Part II. Theology and Ideology. - Epilogue. - Based among others on the testimony of P. Oxy. IV, 655 (= van Haelst 595).
